definitions: Past participle of take, meaning to grasp or capture.
Past participle of take, meaning to carry or transport.
Past participle of take, meaning to consume or ingest.
Past participle of take, meaning to accept or receive.
Past participle of take, meaning to subtract or remove.
examples: He has taken the last piece of cake.
The decision was taken after much deliberation.
She had taken a deep breath.
The city has been taken by the enemy.
